TopicTitle: Crash in map view when creating node

Articles.Content:
Hello all,

I have a space station just outside Kerbin SOI in orbit around Kerbol. If I go into Map View and try to set a maneuver node, KSP crashes. The logs show some kind of infinite loop. Help!

Logs here: http://1drv.ms/1dO12tW
